competitions.name: Bracket Challenge
competitions.description: Two styles enter, one style leaves! The Bracket Challenge is a head-to-head competition where beers go up against each other in a knockout format until a champion is crowned.

competitions.name: Spirit of '76
competitions.description: Celebrate American brewing heritage with the Spirit of '76 competition, focusing on traditional American beer styles that embody the pioneering spirit of 1776.

competitions.name: Ozapft is!
competitions.description: A homebrew competition for all German beer styles. Including most rare German beer styles and German inspired fruit, spice and experimental categories

competitions.name: Draft Horse
competitions.description: The competition goal is to celebrate Belgian Style Beers and all their wonderful variations. From the light and effervescent to the dark and complex, Belgian beers offer a rich tapestry of flavors that captivate the palate.

competitions.name: Redcoat Challenge
competitions.location: Denton County Brewing Company, Denton, TX
competitions.description: The Redcoat Challenge is a homebrew competition that celebrates British beer styles, inviting brewers to showcase their skills in crafting traditional and innovative brews inspired by the rich brewing heritage of the British Isles and Commonwealth Nations.

competitions.name: Santa Bee
competitions.description: The competition goal is to celebrate Mead in all its wonderful variations. From the traditional to the experimental, mead offers a rich tapestry of flavors that captivate the palate.
